snippet: Businesses are preparing revamped menus but with a pending legal challenge to the new ban, some owners are taking a wait-and-see approach in the hope that the beverage industry will win out.
abstract: New York City businesses are preparing revamped menus one day before Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's ban on large sugary drinks goes into effect across the city; pending legal challenge to ban has some owners taking a wait-and-see approach in hopes that the beverage industry will win out.
lead_paragraph: Businesses are preparing revamped menus but with a pending legal challenge to the new ban, some owners are taking a wait-and-see approach in the hope that the beverage industry will win out.

headline.seo: As Some Prepare for Bloomberg’s Large Sugary Drink Ban, Others Vow Defiance
headline.main: Preparation and Vows of Defiance as Big Sugary Drink Ban Is Set to Start
